name: Hide Uncategorized from Category Sidebar Widget
author: Print Science

sections.description:
If your Woocommerce site contains any products that are not manually assigned to a category, they will be assigned to category Uncategorized. The category Uncategorized will then appear in the category sidebar widget. This plugin hides category Uncategorized from the category sidebar widget.

Arbitrary section
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Install the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Does the Designer plugin require WooCommerce

Yes. You must have WooCommerce installed.
